1.name: Dune
1.description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

2.name: The Natural
2.description: An unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.

3.name: The Terminator
3.description: A seemingly indestructible android is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

4.name: The Karate Kid
4.description: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

5.name: Sixteen Candles
5.description: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

6.name: The NeverEnding Story
6.description: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

7.name: Once Upon a Time in America
7.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

8.name: Ghostbusters
8.description: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

9.name: Red Dawn
9.description: It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

10.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
10.description: The monstrous spirit of a slain janitor seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

11.name: Amadeus
11.description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

12.name: Beverly Hills Cop
12.description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

13.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
13.description: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

14.name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
14.description: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

15.name: This Is Spinal Tap
15.description: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

16.name: Police Academy
16.description: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

17.name: Footloose
17.description: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

18.description: In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

19.name: Splash
19.description: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

20.name: Children of the Corn
20.description: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

21.name: Gremlins
21.description: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

22.name: Conan the Destroyer
22.description: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

23.name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
23.description: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

24.name: Romancing the Stone
24.description: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

25.name: Bachelor Party
25.description: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

26.name: Firestarter
26.description: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telekinetic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

27.name: The Last Starfighter
27.description: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

28.name: Paris, Texas
28.description: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

29.name: Revenge of the Nerds
29.description: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

30.name: Streets of Fire
30.description: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

31.name: The Killing Fields
31.description: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

32.name: Hardbodies
32.description: Three middle-aged daddies visit California to have a marvelous time at the beach. When they learn that a nice apartment and an expensive cabriolet isn't enough for them to score with the ...                See full summary »

33.name: Supergirl
33.description: After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

34.name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
34.description: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

35.name: Blood Simple
35.description: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

36.name: Top Secret!
36.description: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

37.name: Body Double
37.description: A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.

38.name: The Bounty
38.description: Fed up with their captain's harsh discipline, a sailing ship's crew decides to take action.

39.name: Bolero
39.description: Set in the 1920s, a young woman sets out to lose her virginity. Her mission leads her to a Moroccan sheikh and a Spanish bullfighter.

40.name: C.H.U.D.
40.description: A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

41.name: Stranger Than Paradise
41.description: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

42.name: The Razor's Edge
42.description: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

43.name: Repo Man
43.description: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

44.name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
44.description: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

45.name: The Toxic Avenger
45.description: Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.

46.name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
46.description: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

47.name: Purple Rain
47.description: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

48.name: Against All Odds
48.description: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

49.name: The Cotton Club
49.description: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people who visited the club, those who ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

50.name: Ghoulies
50.description: A young man and his girlfriend move into an old mansion home, where he becomes possessed by a desire to control ancient demons.
